question.content: one follow-up is it still ok to quote unofficial stuff we see here, or you are expecting this channel to be only questions and no community member answers?

referenced_message.content:
Also have an announcement for the <#829113775876735026> regulars! We're going to be moving to **weekly Q&As**. 

**What does this mean?**
The posting cadence from them might be less during the week or they'll probably just chime in on easy to answer questions.

**Why are you locking the team away from us?!?!**
Well the main reason is that we have a game to build! There's still a few things we need to get ready before the Pre-Alpha (that starts *so soon*). A weekly Q&A gives the team the peace of mind that they'll still be hearing from you and sharing info with you, while also letting them focus on their work.

(Edit: Also I'm not really locking them! I promise no devs will be harmed in this process.)

**When will questions be sent to the team?**
I'll be collecting the questions on the channel on Wednesday. Remember, just because a question was asked doesn't mean it will necessarily be answered. As we've said a few times already, there are somethings we aren't ready to discuss just yet (so please be patient with us).

**When will the questions be answered?**
I plan on having the answers on Thursday. Please bear with us because there's quite a few of you, and I suspect we might get more questions than we can reasonably answer during that time.

answer.content: I think quite a few of you have been doing a stellar job answering some of the questions like those around monetization or Pre-Alpha start dates. So it's been incredibly helpful and I wouldn't want to keep you all from helping each other out with things like that.
